update.description:
depends on the following pull requests:

* [~~sdformat pull request #585~~](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/585/add-emissive_map-to-material-sdf/diff)
* [~~ign-fuel-tools pull request #105~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/pull-requests/105/convert-emissive-map-file-path/diff)
* [~~ign-msgs pull request #155~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/155/add-emissive_map-field-to-materialproto/diff)

    * ~~this broke ign-msgs4 ABI. Implemented a hack in~~ [~~7f936db~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/7f936db8227d2b62d871cd09af349e4d2f762f21) ~~to work around the missing~~ `emissive_map` ~~field~~
    * update [cf8a460](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/cf8a460cc5642c5e862cd5758f60788b06357c2c): bumped to use ign-msgs5
    
* [~~ign-rendering pull request #207~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/207/add-support-for-emissive-map/diff)

Update gazebo to parse emissive\_map property introduced in the PRs above.

Also updated the `fuel_textured_mesh.sdf` example world to include a light fixture model with `emissive_map` property set. Here’s a screenshot:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2958954839-fuel_emissive.png)
‌
update.title: Parse material emissive map

content.html:
Bumped to use transport8 in 56d62ca:

  • gazebodistro
  • release-tools
  • homebrew-simulation

update.description:
depends on the follow pull requests:

* [~~sdformat pull request #585~~](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/585/add-emissive_map-to-material-sdf/diff)
* [~~ign-fuel-tools pull request #105~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-fuel-tools/pull-requests/105/convert-emissive-map-file-path/diff)
* [~~ign-msgs pull request #155~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/155/add-emissive_map-field-to-materialproto/diff)

    * this broke ign-msgs4 ABI. Implemented a hack in [7f936db](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/7f936db8227d2b62d871cd09af349e4d2f762f21) to work around the missing `emissive_map` field
    
* [~~ign-rendering pull request #207~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/207/add-support-for-emissive-map/diff)

Update gazebo to parse emissive\_map property introduced in the PRs above.

Also updated the `fuel_textured_mesh.sdf` example world to include a light fixture model with `emissive_map` property set. Here’s a screenshot:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2958954839-fuel_emissive.png)
‌
update.title: Parse material emissive map

    * this broke ign-msgs4 ABI. Implemented a hack in [7f936db](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/7f936db8227d2b62d871cd09af349e4d2f762f21) to work around the missing `emissive_map` field

Update gazebo to parse emissive\_map property introduced in the PRs above.

Also updated the `fuel_textured_mesh.sdf` example world to include a light fixture model with `emissive_map` property set. Here’s a screenshot:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2958954839-fuel_emissive.png)
‌

content.raw: This PR is targeted at `default`, which will be bumped to use `msgs5`. So I think we could do the bump in this PR.
content.html: This PR is targeted at default, which will be bumped to use msgs5. So I think we could do the bump in this PR.

update.description:
depends on the follow pull requests:

* [sdformat pull request #585](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/585/add-emissive_map-to-material-sdf/diff)

* [~~ign-msgs pull request #155~~](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-msgs/pull-requests/155/add-emissive_map-field-to-materialproto/diff)

    * this broke ign-msgs4 ABI. Implemented a hack in [7f936db](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/commits/7f936db8227d2b62d871cd09af349e4d2f762f21) to work around the missing `emissive_map` field
    
* [ign-rendering pull request #207](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-rendering/pull-requests/207/add-support-for-emissive-map/diff)

Update gazebo to parse emissive\_map property introduced in the PRs above.

Also updated the `fuel_textured_mesh.sdf` example world to include a light fixture model with `emissive_map` property set. Here’s a screenshot:

![](https://bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/2958954839-fuel_emissive.png)
‌
